name: Doll House (Arita)
description:
You're a child welfare investigator, what could go wrong?

A short less than 30 minute game that tackles about an investigator, trying to sift through the case of broken family. Give it a shot, what could go wrong?

Note: this game is a prototype that I made some time ago, it is nowhere near perfect, nor good, but I hope the product is enough to capture the concept! I hope you enjoy the game!
